Colm.io
About – Archive – RSS

About

I’m Colm Mulhall, a software developer based in Limerick, Ireland.

In 2014 I graduated with a degree in Computer Science from the Dublin Institute of Technology. I am currently working as a developer in the telco industry, predominantly writing Java.

You can find me at the following places:

  • Twitter
  • LinkedIn
  • GitHub
  • Email

About This Site

This site is where I write about things that interest me. On a technical side, the site is powered by Jekyll and is hosted on GitHub Pages. I use Hover for dealing with the domain. I have tweaked the appearance to my preference.

I use Sublime Text for any code tweaks. Posts are written in Markdown.
